Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, east of the Khelleva Mansion.
Room.LongDescription: You can see clearly the Khelleva Mansion and Estate to the west. The Mansion is constructed of marble and concrete, making it a virtual fortress against any attack. Before Oceancrest was founded and the City Walls built, the Khelleva Mansion was about the only structure that actually survived attacks against it.
